ai-ja341:1.1_0: made of the ornaments for women and men,
ai-ja341:2.1_0: “This fool sees what you have seen,
ai-ja341:2.2_0: and all the sectarians delighted in the homeless life.
ai-ja341:2.3_0: Having earned the blessing of death,
ai-ja341:2.4_0: another man sees a person’s beset by chance.”
ai-ja341:3.3_0: Endowed, living in a new state,
ai-ja341:3.4_0: Or wouldn’t have the perception of a woman or man?”
ai-ja341:4.1_0: “I’ll have a doubt of the world.
ai-ja341:4.2_0: the King’s wife of King Brahmadatta.
ai-ja341:4.3_0: Endowed, living in a new state,
ai-ja341:4.4_0: Or they’re not reborn in the next life.”
ai-ja341:5.1_0: An eggs are the first tortoise.
